meanings.definition: To grant or sell land for another to build on.
meanings.sent1: The landowner was feuing a plot for the new school building.
meanings.sent2: The city council approved feuing the empty lot for a community garden.
meanings.sent3: The feuing of the land for the playground made the children very happy.
meanings.sent4: Feuing the land was like planting seeds for future growth.
meanings.sent5: Feuing the property transformed it into a bustling neighborhood.

meanings.definition: The act of granting or selling land for another to build on.
meanings.sent1: The feuing of the land was a common practice in the town.
meanings.sent2: She studied the history of feuing in urban development.
meanings.sent3: The feuing of the land became a topic of discussion at the town hall meeting.
meanings.sent4: The feuing process was essential for expanding the city.
meanings.sent5: The feuing of the land brought new life to the community.
